title: Oct 8: Resources for pixel-wise semantic labeling

cells.data:
Recurrent Neural network for pixel-wise classification
https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.03098.pdf
  •  probably not going to be using this, but what is the per-frame process? We could probably adapt this to do frame-wise classification.
  • Github: https://github.com/yuxng/DA-RNN
  • Wei’s installation help: https://markdownshare.com/view/dd63e05b-471d-4534-84e0-49c8b6fa4006

Single-frame pixel-wise classification
https://arxiv.org/pdf/1606.00915.pdf
  • this is probably our best shot. 
  • website: http://liangchiehchen.com/projects/DeepLab.html
    • bitbucket with code: https://bitbucket.org/aquariusjay/deeplab-public-ver2
      • Code seems to be written in caffe.
        • transferring caffe to tensorflow models https://github.com/ethereon/caffe-tensorflow
    • Doesn’t seem to be using depth data at all

Semantic pixel-wise classification with RGBD: http://www.roboticsproceedings.org/rss10/p06.pdf


Crazy complex method with RGBD data: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?tp=&arnumber=8120042


Doing the RGBD segmentation real-time with videos: http://jmlr.org/papers/volume15/couprie14a/couprie14a.pdf

Winner (David chose this): https://arxiv.org/pdf/1803.06791.pdf
